messages:
Name: Ugurcan Çakir
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: April 5, 1996
Position: Goalkeeper
Current club: Trabzonspor
Süper Lig clubs played for: Trabzonspor

Trabzonspor goalkeeper Ugurcan Çakir has played in the vast majority of the team's Süper Lig matches in 2020/2021, making 38 appearances overall and accumulating 3,420 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in all 38 of these appearances across their 40 fixtures.

çAkir last made an appearance in a competition game on May 15, playing 90 minutes for Trabzonspor versus Gençlerbirliği in a 2-1 success. The Trabzonspor goalkeeper has kept 13 clean sheets this season, which is tied for the most in the competition. He has been shown two yellow cards.
çAkir played 33 Süper Lig games last season for Trabzonspor, keeping four clean sheets, while also providing one assist.
çAkir returned to Trabzonspor in July 2016 after a loan spell at 1461 Trabzon, for whom he made eight league appearances in total.
